snippet: Angry critics said the Russian Skating Federation should not have given the ailing Evgeni Plushenko a place on the Olympic team.
abstract: Withdrawal of preeminent Russian figure skater Evgeni Plushenko from the Sochi Games due to back injury is met with both stunned silence and a backlash of anger; critics argue that Plushenko, whose career has been ended by the injury, should not have been allowed to skate in compromised condition, and that another Russian skater should have gone in his place.
lead_paragraph: Angry critics said the Russian Skating Federation should not have given the ailing Evgeni Plushenko a place on the Olympic team.
